name.ja: <ruby>帝<rt>てい</rt></ruby><ruby>王<rt>おう</rt></ruby>の<ruby>登<rt>とう</rt></ruby><ruby>竜<rt>りゅう</rt></ruby>

requirement.en: When your opponent Normal or Special Summons a monster.

effect.en: Shuffle 3 monsters with 1000 DEF from your Graveyard into the Deck. Then, if you have no cards in your Extra Deck, you can destroy 1 face-up monster on your opponent's field.

ja.set_name: Structure Deck: Triumphant Return of the Monarchs
Structure Deck: Triumphant Return of the Monarchs
